parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.85

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Sounds

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns current value set to the controller (see [[setCustomSoundController]])

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''getCustomSoundController''' [vehicle, controller]

</value></part><part><name>p1 </name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]] - must be a transport type vehicle (doesn't work on characters or buildings)

</value></part><part><name>p2 </name>=<value> controller: [[String]] - name of custom sound controller. Need to be full string like i.e. "CustomSoundController1". Currently you can pick from "CustomSoundController1" to "CustomSoundController32"
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]]
</value></part><part><name>x1 </name>=<value> <code>[[getCustomSoundController]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[vehicle]] [[player]], "CustomSoundController1"];</code>
</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[Arma 3 Sound]], [[setCustomSoundController]], [[getCustomSoundControllerCount]], [[getSoundController]], [[getSoundControllerResult]], [[getAllSoundControllers]], [[getEnvSoundController]], [[getAllEnvSoundControllers]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">



<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
